intro: Epidendrum caribiorum, commonly known as the Caribian Epidendrum, is a tropical orchid native to the Caribbean region. It is characterized by its clustered, pendulous inflorescences that bear numerous small, showy flowers in shades of white, yellow, and green. The plant typically grows as an epiphyte on trees or rocks, thriving in humid, warm environments.
